# Creating requirements.txt
requirements_content = """numpy>=1.21.0
scipy>=1.7.0
pandas>=1.3.0
matplotlib>=3.4.0
seaborn>=0.11.0
scikit-learn>=1.0.0
qutip>=4.7.0
plotly>=5.0.0
requests>=2.25.0
"""

with open('requirements.txt', 'w') as f:
    f.write(requirements_content)
print("âœ… Created requirements.txt")
